mecard

Class BImportCustomerLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.BImportCustomerLoader

  • public class BImportCustomerLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class queues the bimport customers and, run as a timed process, will load all the customers found in the Customer directory since the last time it ran. This is done because bimport cannot be run concurrently. java -cp MeCard.jar mecard.BImportCustomerLoader
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the entire process of loading customer bimport files as a timed process such as cron or Windows scheduler.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • getLockFile

        protected static java.io.File getLockFile()
        Returns:
        null if there is a bimport process running and a new lock file otherwise.

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the BImport load and cleans the directory. The even if the bimport load cannot be run all but one existing header will be removed, all batch files will be removed and all patron account files will be concatenated into one big bimport file. The header and bimport file always have unique names and are never removed in this process.

      • getFileList

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileList(java.lang.String loadDir,
                                           java.lang.String fileSuffix)
        Creates a list of strings of fully-qualified path names for files within a given directory that end with the argument file suffix.
        Parameters:
        loadDir - Specifies a directory to search.
        fileSuffix - Specifies the type of files to search. The supplied string will be used in the String.endsWith(java.lang.String) method.
        Returns:
        List of files.

      • clean

        protected void clean(java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
        Parameters:
        fileList - names of all files that are to be deleted.
